rules_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
{1}, Sacrifice Soaring Dreams: Obscure the top card of your library. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
Whenever Soaring Dreams leaves the battlefield, up to one target creature gains flying until end of turn.
